WebApplication.summary: Genixo is a passionate web development company that is capable of delivering complex projects beyond the limits of conventional website creation.
WebApplication.name: Web Application
WebApplication.description:
Genixo is a passionate web development company that is capable of delivering complex projects beyond the limits of conventional website creation.

Web Application and Cloud Development
With Genixo, your visions and ideas become a high-quality product. According to your needs, even a demanding web application can be implemented in an organized manner. In the light of the solutions provided and development, your projects become successful, your vision comes to life.
Web Design
Genixo provides user-centered and relevant UI/UX designs. By using these industry-leading ideas, your vision becomes clear and your audience gains enthusiasm.
Web Integration and Quality Assurance
Regardless of the integration requirements of your projects, Genixo provides complete third-party support for web presences or applications. Furthermore, our methodology obliges us to successfully develop a comprehensive, bug-free and stable application.
Technologies we use:

ArchitectureAsAService.summary:
Solution Architecture Benefits
Designing architecture for a software solution focuses on achieving qualitative output because you have a blueprint of the functionalities and their requirements.
ArchitectureAsAService.name: Architecture as a Service
ArchitectureAsAService.description:
Solution Architecture Benefits
Designing architecture for a software solution focuses on achieving qualitative output because you have a blueprint of the functionalities and their requirements. Helps plan the project lifecycle by providing a general solution structure. Simplifies dealing with complexity because you can observe the big picture with its challenges. Advises on estimation and costing by meeting the requirements of the main stakeholder.
Business, Operations and Technology
The emphasis is on result-oriented procedure, the focus is on smart and robust solutions, the priority is the material aspect of solution delivery. Solution Architecture

According to your ecosystem and audience, Genixo provides a foundation for your projects by tailoring IT solutions.

We define functional requirements and implementation phases according to your business needs.

CustomSoftwareDevelopment.summary: Genixo's professional team designs, creates, deploys and maintains your custom software needs for specific sets of users, functions and organizations.
CustomSoftwareDevelopment.name: Custom Software Development
CustomSoftwareDevelopment.description:
Genixo's professional team designs, creates, deploys and maintains your custom software needs for specific sets of users, functions and organizations. The solutions we offer here are uniquely built for your business and can include all web, mobile and desktop applications.

DevOpsServices.summary: A successful DevOps model is based on four key building blocks: Develop, Build and Test, Deploy, Operate and Monitor.
DevOpsServices.name: DevOps Services
DevOpsServices.description:
A successful DevOps model is based on four key building blocks: Develop, Build and Test, Deploy, Operate and Monitor. Genixo can do this for you!

Assessment and Planning
We build a roadmap by analyzing and virtualizing the desired state by identifying traceable metrics.
CI/CD Pipeline
We link development operations through Continuous Deployment - Integration - Testing - Deployment.
Process Automation
We automate the CI/CD pipeline from the beginning of coding to production by encapsulating builds, test cases, versioning and deployment.
Security Integration
We perform end-to-end security integration through the 'Security as Code' mechanism.

CloudDevelopment.summary: Due to its scalability, speed and price performance, cloud solutions are increasingly preferred by businesses
CloudDevelopment.name: Cloud Development
CloudDevelopment.description:
Due to its scalability, speed and price performance, cloud solutions are increasingly preferred by businesses and Genixo offers end-to-end solutions for your business needs in this field.
Cloud Native Development

We determine which services and at what intensity you will use cloud options for your product, and we build your product from scratch on the cloud.
Cloud Migration

Genixo migrates your data from on-premise infrastructure to the cloud, ensuring its security.
Application Re-architecture

We improve or redevelop an existing product in the Cloud according to needs.
Cloud Consulting

Organizing business transformation with innovative cloud applications and providing detailed advice at every stage of the transition.

MobileDevelopment.description:

Cross-Platform Application Development
Genixo can also offer you cross-platform application development. With our dynamism and passion, enjoy adjustable and high-performing applications.

DataScience.summary: In the 21st century, also called the Information Age, data has become increasingly valuable due to technological developments
DataScience.name: Data Science
DataScience.description:
In the 21st century, also called the Information Age, data has become increasingly valuable due to technological developments. Machines become extremely 'intelligent' to the point that even scientists cannot predict where this journey will lead. Data Science, 'the sexiest job of the 21st century' as declared by Harvard Business Review, is the combination of programming and mathematics in order to design models capable of extracting insights or making predictions better and faster compared to humans. Unprocessed data makes your business inefficient. It is only after the data has been processed that the right insights can be revealed and the analysis created in the light of these insights will carry your business to the peak of its potential. Because data is the most valuable thing of our age, reveal the value of data.

Data Acquisition
If there is not enough data to analyze, we could create the data pipeline if it is accessible or guide you to create an appropriate data acquisition system.
Data Preprocessing
Data sources are not reliable. Therefore, we cleaned the data of inaccurate, aberrant and noisy ones to create more accurate models.
Model Design
We designed a mathematical or machine learning model that describes your system as well as possible.
Data Analysis
By using the model trained by your data, we could reveal the insights of your current or upcoming data stream.
Report/Result
We could demonstrate the insights revealed by our model in a user-friendly dashboard.
There are mainly 3 techniques in data science;

Classification
Models are trained in such a way as to label data according to users' preferences. The most explanatory and clich√© example of this method is spam or ham mail labeling. From the dataset, the model learns the difference between ham and spam mails and could easily label upcoming mails accordingly.
Regression
Basically, regression is finding the best-fitting function for the dataset. By using this function, correlation in the dataset or prediction of the future could be achieved.
Clustering
In scenarios where the number of classes is not predefined as in classification problems, models could be trained in such a way as to divide the dataset. These classes would help us understand the relationship and distribution in the dataset.
Data Science techniques are mainly used in;

Decision Making and Prediction
Process Optimization
Pattern Recognition
Data Analytics
Recommendation Systems
Computer Vision
Technologies we use:
